title: Tyler1 Megathread
body:
{{champion:267}} Here is a spot to discuss the recent happenings regarding Tyler1. Please remember that this subject is a heated one for some people but we do still expect you to follow the rules here :) Be respectful to one another.

edit: threads pertaining to Tyler1 will not be deleted.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4tlwzqkeGyI
